alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Edgefield, northwestern Aiken and south central Saluda Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgefield County Airport, or 11 miles north of Belvedere, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Edgefield County Airport, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 26 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
